thread.title: Donna Karan's fashion wisdom, in 7 easy pieces
thread.title_full: Donna Karan's fashion wisdom, in 7 easy pieces

title: Donna Karan's fashion wisdom, in 7 easy pieces
text:
> Top News Donna Karan's fashion wisdom, in 7 easy pieces In this Oct. 5, 2015 photo, fashion designer Donna Karan poses during an interview in New York. Karan has a memoir coming out next week "My Journey," a volume chock full of very personal, entertaining anecdotes. (AP Photo/Bebeto Matthews) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team!
